articles.title: The 'mystery' of India's low coronavirus death rate - 9News
articles.description: There are close to 30,000 coronavirus infections in India – second only to China in Asia – but the country has recorded just 934 deaths, nearly two months after its first recorded case.

articles.title: Meet the 101-year-old who was born on a ship during the 1918 flu pandemic and just beat coronavirus - CNN

articles.description: Professors have collected dream samples from around the world showing the psychological effects of the coronavirus pandemic are transcending culture, language and national boundaries.
articles.content:
